cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MA, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with energy-efficient transmission schemes over fading channels, which is a common topic in the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) sub-categories. The paper also discusses the use of dynamic programming and stochastic processes to optimize the transmission policy, which falls under the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category. Additionally, the paper uses mathematical optimization techniques to maximize throughput, which is a common topic in the Mathematical Optimization (cs.MA) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the practical implementation of the proposed algorithms, which falls under the Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-category.
